name: disrespectable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not worth someone's respect, or not respectable (= considered to be socially acceptable): Never has the organization been more disrespectable or useless. No respectable, nor even a disrespectable, university would hire her now.
More examplesFewer examplesHe embraces rather than ignoring the disrespectable elements of her story.Many characters in the stories treat her as though she is disrespectable and an unwelcome influence on the household.In the end, he received a far from disrespectable 161 votes.
